textContent:
I want to move to Thessoloniki and DJ coffee shops and clubs every night until late. I want to wake up late and go to the restaurant to eat food then work every day at and on a business, figuring out ways to apply AI to solve the worlds problems. I want to smoke a cigarette at the cafe while I work. I want to feel like I am doing something meaningful. Like what I am doing matters. I want to party hard and ride the waves of exhuberance and exhaustion. 

I want to spend time with my family where my kids are kind and polite. Where they listen to each other. I want to feel like Gil is happy and excited about life, about what is going on in life, about what ish appening. That means she does what she wants and says what she needs. She tells me and she does it. When our needs are different we work it out and figure out how to help support each other.
title: Wants
textContentHtml:
I want to move to Thessoloniki and DJ coffee shops and clubs every night until late. I want to wake up late and go to the restaurant to eat food then work every day at and on a business, figuring out ways to apply AI to solve the worlds problems. I want to smoke a cigarette at the cafe while I work. I want to feel like I am doing something meaningful. Like what I am doing matters. I want to party hard and ride the waves of exhuberance and exhaustion. 


I want to spend time with my family where my kids are kind and polite. Where they listen to each other. I want to feel like Gil is happy and excited about life, about what is going on in life, about what ish appening. That means she does what she wants and says what she needs. She tells me and she does it. When our needs are different we work it out and figure out how to help support each other.
